name: RHEM IV lite
description:
Let "RHEM IV lite" take you into a world full of strange vehicles and buildings, secret passages and doorways. You will need a sense of adventure, logic, attentiveness and the ability to solve puzzles to uncover the secrets in the world of RHEM.

"RHEM IV lite" allows you to pay a short visit to the mysterious land of RHEM. In this version you will have to find one of the nine golden Fragments, that can be hidden anywhere on RHEM....

The full version of "RHEM IV SE", that can be found here in the Mac Appstore features a.o.:

- Non linear gameplay: a fascinating world full of riddles and enigmas
- an abundance of exciting secret rooms and hidden paths
- new „album“ feature allowing you to collect and use hints
- family friendly and non-violent gameplay
- color picker feature allowing the color-blind to solve puzzles
- SE edition features two undiscovered areas and many new puzzles and challenges
